data.context: Here's a stat that'll shock you: 76% of Sydney B2B companies create content that gets zero leads. We're talking about businesses in Parramatta, North [Sydney](/blog/keyword-research-for-local-sydney-businesses-the-complete-framework/), and the CBD. They spend $30,000+ each year on content that might as well be invisible.
